Magnitude 7.6 earthquake strikes Japan, tsunami warning issuedAn earthquake with a preliminary magnitude of 7.6 hit north central Japan on Monday, public broadcaster NHK said. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 07:26:50 GMT第3346章https://www.reuters.com/world/japan/magnitude-74-earthquake-strikes-japan-tsunami-warning-issued-2024-01-01/Reuters世界日本
Heavy rains in Australia's east bring more pain to storm-hit residentsHeavy rains lashed parts of Australia's east on Monday, triggering flash flooding, inundating roads and bringing more pain for some residents reeling after the intense thunderstorms that hit the region over the Christmas holidays. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 06:32:01 GMT 4P5Y3ZUVMFPI5N6LKXVRWEKMQA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/heavy-rains-australias-east-bring-more-pain-storm-hit-residents-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Zelenskiy speaks of war, Putin makes passing reference in contrasting New Year speechesUkraine President Volodymyr Zelenskiy honoured his people's resilience in times of bloodshed in a long and lyrical New Year speech, while Russian leader Vladimir Putin stressed his country's unity in a short and stern message that made only passing reference to the war. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 04:31:16 GMT L3NHAOQRENJKZAA2DROVGN34FY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-speaks-war-putin-makes-passing-reference-contrasting-new-year-speeches-2024-01-01/Lidia Kelly世界欧洲
China's Xi, US President Biden exchange congratulations on 45 years of diplomatic tiesChina's President Xi Jinping exchanged congratulations with U.S. President Joe Biden on the 45th anniversary of diplomatic ties between the two countries, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 03:24:40 GMT 5I2XUBDZIBN6DMNEODKM4RYU7A https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-us-president-biden-exchange-congratulations-45th-year-diplomatic-ties-2024-01-01/Liz Lee世界
Taiwan president says ties with China must be decided by will of the peopleTaiwan's relations with China must be decided by the will of the people and peace must be based on "dignity", President Tsai Ing-wen said on Monday after China's leader, Xi Jinping, said "reunification" with the island is inevitable. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 02:14:30 GMT UDME3OP7GVIUXFSEMKOIFN2HZ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-president-says-ties-with-china-must-be-decided-by-will-people-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine, Russia accuse each other of early New Year's Day attacksUkraine's shelling of Donetsk killed four people, a Russian-installed official said, while Ukrainian officials said at least one person was killed in Russia's air attack on Odesa. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 01:04:44 GMT G7WKYMYDSBMDZE7P7JJ6KXVKRY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine- Russia-accuse-each-other-early-new-years-day-attacks-2024-01-01/Reuters世界欧洲
New Zealand says China's safeguard duties on milk powder overNew Zealand said on Monday all its dairy products were now able to enter China duty-free as safeguard duties on milk powder ended on Dec. 31, marking the removal of all remaining tariffs agreed upon in the free trade deal between the two countries. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 00:20:06 GMT INZUV4ZDYVOXZPETT52CDKR2CI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/new-zealand-says-chinas-safeguard-duties-milk-powder-over-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
North Korea's Kim says armed conflict becoming reality because of US - KCNANorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un told the country's military commanders the most powerful means must be mobilized to destroy the United States and South Korea if they choose military confrontation, state media reported on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 00:09:46 GMT LGQ3PH3YBVKEHDQFHLGMPLMZAY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-says-armed-conflict-becoming-reality-because-us-kcna-2024-01-01/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Zelenskiy says Ukraine stronger as it moves toward year two of warZelenskiy made almost no direct reference to the situation on the front line, the limited success of Ukraine's counteroffensive or the difficulties in securing continued military and other aid from the U.S. and EU. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 23:01:21 GMT LH6JNJ4NDVO63GV277PIVCS2QI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-says-ukraine-stronger-it-moves-toward-year-two-war-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korea Kim Jong Un, China's Xi exchange message vowing closer ties, Yonhap reportsNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un and Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to further develop relationship of cooperation between the two countries, in New Year messages exchanged on Monday, South Korea's Yonhap news reported citing the North's state radio. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 21:57:28 GMT GNPQ4R5W6FJWLPKQVAAE3KR7C4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-kim-jong-un-chinas-xi-exchange-message-vowing-closer-ties-yonhap-2023-12-31/Reuters世界亚太地区
German police arrest three more over alleged Cologne Cathedral attack plotThe alleged attackers planned to use a car to attack the 800-year-old Gothic edifice, police said. Sun, 31 Dec 2023 19:48:53 GMT 2BK54PIJ3BIG3JAB4O7RF6RBJM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-police-arrest- Three-more-over-alleged-cologne-cathedral-attack-plot-2023-12-31/Reuters世界欧洲
